# types.ContentToolRequest { #chatlas.types.ContentToolRequest }

```python
types.ContentToolRequest(self, id, name, arguments)
```

A request to call a tool/function

This content type isn't meant to be used directly. Instead, it's
automatically generated by [](`~chatlas.Chat`) when a tool/function is
requested by the model assistant.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name      | Type               | Description                                 | Default    |
|-----------|--------------------|---------------------------------------------|------------|
| id        | [str](`str`)       | A unique identifier for this request.       | _required_ |
| name      | [str](`str`)       | The name of the tool/function to call.      | _required_ |
| arguments | [object](`object`) | The arguments to pass to the tool/function. | _required_ |
